owltools.util

Class AbstractTarjan<NODE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • owltools.util.AbstractTarjan<NODE>
  • Type Parameters:
    NODE - identifier for a node in the graph
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tarjan<NODE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MappingTarjan

    public abstract class AbstractTarjan<NODE>
extends Object
implements Tarjan<NODE>
    Basic implementation for the Tarjan algorithm. This implementation relies on adjacency information provided by Adjacency.
